Pre-Game Insights: Detroit Tigers have won six games in a row
Los Angeles Angels have lost seven games in a row
Detroit has covered the run line in eight of their last nine games against AL West opponents
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Tigers are 33-32 at home this year, while the Angels are 27-39 on the road
Detroit is starting Montero, who has bounced back from a very bad start to his year
Los Angeles has been awful over the last few weeks and they are starting Kochanowicz, who has been better recently, but has bad numbers on the season
Others: David uses full season statistics, with an emphasis on recent results, to find the best value
